name: Treasure (Dan)
description:
A paper puzzle I made for Global Game Jam 2021. The theme is "lost and find".

I want to recreate the experience of finding treasures with a treasure map when I was playing Sea of Thieves.

Goal
  • Find all the buried treasures!!
Rules
  • Each number in the grid represents a Faulty Treasure Detector
  • The number on a detector means that at least one treasure is located within a N x N square covering the detector
  • Each detector has its corresponding square range
  • The position of a treasure is determined if it’s the only intersection of  three squares
  • An intersection of four or more squares is a false-positive result, which means no treasure there
  • Treasures aren’t buried under detectors
  • There are exactly two more detectors than there are treasures

You need to construct a layout of the square of detectors and mark the position of treasures

Credit
